execute

public java.lang.String execute()
Executes the viewBids function by retrieving pending bids and successful bids from student. Executes sortBidsForDisplay() method to sort the bids. Add "no bids" message if student do not have bids

Specified by:
execute in interface com.opensymphony.xwork2.Action
Overrides:
execute in class com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionSupport
Returns:
SUCCESS

sortBidsForDisplay

public void sortBidsForDisplay()
Method executes sortBidsIntoDays() and sortDayBidsByTime() for display purpose

sortBidsIntoDays

public void sortBidsIntoDays()
Method to sort bids into five different ArrayList for display purpose

sortDayBidsByTime

public void sortDayBidsByTime(java.util.ArrayList<Bid> dayBids)
Method to sort bids into different Time for display purpose

Parameters:
dayBids - the bids to sort
